tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_image_archives (
  image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  image_name TEXT,
  image_path TEXT,
  capture_date DATE,
  satellite_name TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
  image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_name VARCHAR(255),
  image_url VARCHAR(255),
  image_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE image_tags (
  tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tag_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE image_relationships (
  relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_id INT,
  tag_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    image_location VARCHAR(255),
    image_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    image_resolution VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE image_metadata (
  metadata_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  image_id UUID,
  tag_id UUID,
  category_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES satellite_images (image_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES image_tags (tag_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES image_categories (category_id)
);
